name: Snakes & Ladders (Vlad NY)
description:
Snakes & Ladders Buildbox 3 template for 3.5.0.

This is a digital recreation of a classical Snakes & Ladders Board game. The board includes the basic Game Manager setup for UI appearance and some rules:

Before you buy it please read below:

Free Contains:

  •  Up to 4 players in one game
  •  Up to 4 AI in one game
  • Player Movement
  • Notification setup and more

Paid Contains:

  • UI configuration before the game starts
  • Up to 13 players in one game
  • Up to 13 AI in one game (making a total of 26 playable objects 50% players and 50% AI)
  • Snakes path movement (the pieces follow the snake's asset when falling down)
  • Show top notification on turn events
  • Assets used in-game

Don't forget to check out a match between AIs below:
